::Prowl::

He watches as Megatron's fusion blast hits the ground below him. Since
he was in air it did no damage.
"Like wise Megatron. You want your guy, grab his kentucky fried corpse,
and get the hell out of here."
Firestrike's words, cause him to turn around.
"You are right. I am no Autobot. I'm a Maximal, and I'm fighting a war
here. There are no games in war.!"
He then sees what Firestrike is doing with the energon.
He flies upwards at high speeds.
"Holy sh*t!"

A massive explosion takes out the building they were near. Still only a
small part of the City as a whole. The exploasion would have killed any
near, especially Firestrike, himself....
